short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension shows top 20 most popular TV Series on Netflix. Only reliable, independent results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Truly independent ranking of most popular Netflix Series in the US. If you are interested in what users watch and not what Netflix wants you to watch - this extension is right for you!
